Reviews.Content: Very good stay. We were four pairs on a weekend trip to Berlin. We was reccomended the hotel through some friends, and we was very pleased.The rooms was large with very big and comfortable beds. A clean and nice bathroom,and a big relaxing lounge. Also a balcony.In the restaurant, where the reception was, they served breakfast at least until 1200AM!!Friendly staff, and central location.12,5 Euro for a taxi from Tegel airport. (5km)
Reviews.Author: jan arild
